title: semantic error: Variable 'DP' not declared for Alan Miller's ziggurat.f90
body:
*Original issue*: https://gitlab.com/lfortran/lfortran/-/issues/623

(base) /mnt/c/fortran/test$ lfortran -c [ziggurat.f90](https://jblevins.org/mirror/amiller/ziggurat.f90)
(code is at link)
```
semantic error: Variable 'DP' not declared
  --> ziggurat.f90:21:32
   |
21 |    REAL(DP), PARAMETER  ::  m1=2147483648.0_DP,   m2=2147483648.0_DP,      &
```

but the start of the code does define DP

```
! Marsaglia & Tsang generator for random normals & random exponentials.
! Translated from C by Alan Miller (amiller[@ bigpond](https://gitlab.com/bigpond).net.au)

! Marsaglia, G. & Tsang, W.W. (2000) `The ziggurat method for generating
! random variables', J. Statist. Software, v5(8).

! This is an electronic journal which can be downloaded from:
! http://www.jstatsoft.org/v05/i08

! N.B. It is assumed that all integers are 32-bit.
! N.B. The value of M2 has been halved to compensate for the lack of
!      unsigned integers in Fortran.

! Latest version - 1 January 2001
MODULE Ziggurat
   IMPLICIT NONE

   PRIVATE

   INTEGER,  PARAMETER  ::  DP=SELECTED_REAL_KIND( 12, 60 )
   REAL(DP), PARAMETER  ::  m1=2147483648.0_DP,   m2=2147483648.0_DP,      &
                            half=0.5_DP
```
If the code is converted to lower case [ziggurat.f90](/uploads/61b748740698144f1b481cb2f490aac3/ziggurat.f90) the error is

```
(base) /mnt/c/fortran/test$ lfortran -c ziggurat.f90
semantic error: Attribute type not implemented yet
  --> ziggurat.f90:28:4 - 29:41
first (28:4)

   ^~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
last (29:41)
                            ke(0:255), hz
^~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
```
